text: 12 Bucks is a 1998 American drama film directed by Wayne Isham and starring Scott Waugh and Sean Graham, both of whom produced the film and wrote the screenplay. ==Cast== *Scott Waugh as Johnny *Sean Graham as Tanner *Ming-Na Wen as Gorgeous *Irene Bedard as Babe *Ernest Borgnine as Lucky *David Chokachi as Evil Lovejoy *Marj Dusay as Oldie *David Faustino as Cornfed *Alexandra Paul as Epiphany Lovejoy *Jonathan Silverman as Hyper *James Avery as Slow ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American films Category:American drama films
title: 12 Bucks
